#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <climits>
#include <cstring>
#include <cmath>
#include <map>
#include <vector>
#include <cstdio>


#define pp push_back
#define gc getchar_unlocked

int MOD  = 1000000000 + 7;

using namespace std;

void scanint(long long int &x)
{
    register long long int c = gc();
    x = 0;
    for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
}

using namespace std;

int main()
{



	long long int test;
	scanint(test);


	while(test--)
	{
		long long int tempcase;
		scanint(tempcase);
		long long int ind = sqrt(tempcase);

		while ((ind *(ind+1)/2) <= tempcase) ind+=1;

		long long int lower = (ind-1)*ind/2 + 1;

		long long int diff = tempcase - lower;

//		cout<<ind<<" "<<diff<<endl;
		long long int x = 0,y = 0;

		if (ind%2)
		{
			x = ind-diff;
			y = 1+diff;
		}
		else
		{
			x = 1+diff;
			y = ind-diff;
		}

		cout<<"("<<x<<","<<y<<")\n";

	}


	return 0;
}
